Title: Relates to requiring the notification of a public utility company's or municipality's customers when the supply rate increases by at least one hundred percent
Summary: Requires the notification of a public utility company's or municipality's customers when the supply rate increases by at least one hundred percent by posting on the utility company's website.
LawCode: Add ยง44-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the notification of a public utility company's or municipality's customers when the supply rate increases by at least one hundred percent
